questions.question: What is the primary function of the renin-angiotensin-aldosterone system (RAAS)?
options: Maintain blood pressure and fluid balance
questions.answer: Maintain blood pressure and fluid balance

questions.question: Which of the following is the primary site of gas exchange in the lungs?
What is the primary role of antidiuretic hormone (ADH) in the body?
options: Promote water reabsorption in the kidneys
questions.answer: Promote water reabsorption in the kidneys

questions.question: Which of the following is the primary function of the sinoatrial (SA) node?
options: Initiate the electrical impulse for heart contraction
questions.answer: Initiate the electrical impulse for heart contraction

questions.question: What is the primary role of the liver in carbohydrate metabolism?
options: Store glycogen and regulate blood glucose
Break down proteins into amino acids
questions.answer: Store glycogen and regulate blood glucose

Which of the following is the primary function of the pancreas in digestion?
